instruction: Find the disease, gene and relation entities in the below english language biomedical text.
guideline: The relation is one of “therapeutic”, “biomarker” or “genomic_alterations”. If no relation is found the relation is “NA”.
expected_output: Display results in tsv format with the column headers 'Gene', 'Disease', 'Relation' to annotate the entities. Provide each triplet in a new line.
